Internet Of Things  Courses

IOT refers to the millinons of devices that are connected to the internet.It’s interrelated computing devices with unique identification elements and the capability to transmit data over a network without the help of a human being.An LED bulb switched on with the help of a smartphone and a person with a pacemaker is also part of IOT.When a Device is linked to this network, it becomes intelligent and efficient.

What you will learn

This Specialization covers the development of the Internet of Things (IoT) products and services—including devices for sensing, actuation, processing, and communication—to help you develop skills and experiences you can employ in designing novel systems. The Specialization has theory and lab sections. In the lab sections, you will learn hands-on IoT concepts such as sensing, actuation, and communication. In the final Capstone Project, developed in Arduino/Raspberry PI  you’ll apply the skills you learned on a project of your choice using the respective platform.

Syllabus

Introduction to IoT

· Introduction to the concept of IoT
· IoT Ecosystem
· Hardware
· Sensors
· IoT Stack and Protocols

Introduction to SOC & Micro Controllers

· Introduction
· Raspberry
· NodeMcu
· Arduino
· Interfaces

Interfacing with the external world

· TCP/IP Communication
· HTTP/REST interfaces
· MQTT

IOT Security

· Standards and Best practices
· Common vulnerabilities
· Hardware and Software solutions

IoT Model Application and demo or hands-on training

· Explanation and demonstration of an end to end IoT model application
